response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $800,000. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This investment promises long-term benefits that could potentially far exceed the initial cost. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business growth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
